data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Roszkowska, Daniel Adrian Ciobanu Milena, Kaczmarek, Łukasz (2015): Two new tardigrade species from Romania (Eutardigrada: Milnesiidae, Macrobiotidae), with some remarks on secondary sex characters in Milnesium dornensis sp. nov. Zootaxa 3941 (4): 542-564, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3941.4.4
